long_description: Protect your tailgate finish with the Thule Gate Mate Tailgate protective pad for your pickup truck when loading and unloading bikes. Ultra durable, heavy-duty vinyl pad with foam padding protects both bike and truck tailgate. Integrated blocks prevent bikes from sliding off edge of tailgate. Strap anchors on pad provide tie-down points for bikes and other loads. Durable nylon straps keep pad securely attached to tailgate. Tailgate handle is easily accessed through center flap of pad. Available in 2 sizes to fit full-size and compact pickups; 54 and 62 in.
short_description: Protect your tailgate finish with the Thule Gate Mate Tailgate protective pad for your pickup truck when loading and unloading bikes.
